Commands.Name: Ordinal Date
Commands.Description: Convert dates into long format including the ordinal suffixes "th", "st", "nd" and "rd"

Commands.Name: Ordinal Number
Commands.Description: Convert selected numbers to text including the ordinal suffixes "th", "st", "nd" and "rd"

Commands.Name: Ordinal Suffix
Commands.Description: Get the Ordinal suffixes (st, nd, rd, th) for selected numbers

Commands.Name: Show Formulas
Commands.Description: Apply ShowFormulas lambda function to active cell.
